publications: [{"title":"Ca$hing In on LinkedIn: Building a LinkedIn audience that generates 3-5 inbound leads a day and 6 figure$ a year","subtitle":"Self","date":"October 25, 2021","description":"700+ digital copies sold"},{"title":"Freelancing Freedom: From Caged Ideas to Your First Client [and more] in 10 Days","subtitle":"Self","date":"July 4, 2021","description":"1000+ digital copies sold"},{"title":"Money Call$: Prospect Conversation Systems I Used To Go From Broke Student To Closing $5000+ Deals On The Phone","subtitle":"Self","date":"March 23, 2021","description":"400+ digital copies sold"},{"title":"How I Became A Doctor... of Words!","subtitle":"edumilestones.com","date":"July 5, 2019","description":"[This story won First Place in the #MyCareerStory contest and was originally published on edumilestones.com]It took me 2 years of a terrible high school experience to realise how much I loved writing.I needed a few months of internships after college to find out what kind of writing I love.It took me another few months of even more internships to find out I was actually good at the kind of writing I loved.And today, I am in love with who I am and what I do.Just because I chose my own career.I've had a topsy-turvy ride, and I discovered what I loved: Content Writing.Hope you have a topsy-turvy ride, only to end up discovering what YOU love!It's a long story... but it's only just begun! :)"},{"title":"[EXPERT OPINION]: 10 things you should know before starting out as a Content Writer","subtitle":"CoFoundersTown.com","date":"June 19, 2019"},{"title":"Important Lessons Every Young Entrepreneur Must Learn from Taylor Swift","subtitle":"knowlab.in","date":"May 23, 2019","description":"Whatever be your opinion of Taylor Swift, you canâ€™t deny the staggering numbers she has achieved. These 3 attributes are what helped Taylor Swift get where she is now. Read on to know how she did it!"},{"title":"Maleficent and Me: Arguments!","subtitle":"Verbys","date":"Feb 2019","description":"This article is a fun, comical, satirical take on the nature of my arguments. It is a creative piece, one which is unlike anything I have written before. Read on to find out how my arguments compare to Maleficent, the Mistress of All Evil!"},{"title":"Compassion and Empathy in Business Leadership- Lessons from the CEO of LinkedIn Jeff Weiner","subtitle":"buildandbalance.com","date":"October 25, 2018"},{"title":"Introduction to Design Thinking","subtitle":"Trinity Entrepreneurial Society","date":"October 24, 2018"}]
